name: windows-incorrect_path_process
pattern: {"platform": "windows", "description": "ATT&CK: T1034", "queries": {"conhost.exe_incorrect_path": {"query": "SELECT * FROM processes WHERE LOWER(name)='conhost.exe' AND LOWER(path)!='c:\\windows\\system32\\conhost.exe' AND path!='';", "interval": 3600, "description": "Detect processes masquerading as legitimate Windows processes -
